name: Anoop Kumar
shortdesc: Agile oriented professional with 17+ years of technical management and development experience in Java technology.

data.name: TCS
desc: Technically managed and developed back-end rest services for IHG using the Agile approach. (2019-2020)
Agile development of hybrid mobile applications integrating WIDEN and Office 365 API for GE Healthcare. (2016-2018)
Developed proof of concept using Python and ELK stack for calculating IPTE metrics for GE Healthcare. (2018)
Managed, maintained and supported Nielsen Audio applications with team size of 10. (2014-2015)

data.name: Arbitron
desc: Developed and maintained different products for Arbitron, majorly in Tapscan.
Designed, developed and deployed Multiselect Component using JSF and EJS Treegrid (Coqsoft).

data.name: IBM
desc: Involved in the development and maintenance of different products for clients Sprint & CenturyLink (formerly Embarq)
Involved in the development of point-of-sale applications using Oracle 360 tour framework.

data.name: Ekomate
desc: Involved in the development of an insurance product for 3rd party insurance companies (DSRM).
Technically managed a team of size 3 and mentored them in the technology stack.

data.name: On the Spot Award (2017)
desc: From TCS - GE relationship for working on Proof of Concept that involves integration of Office 365 document API's with hybrid mobile application.

data.name: Emerging Star Award (2014)
desc: From TCS â€“ Nielsen Relationship for building and mentoring Service Delivery team within short time.

data.name: Award from IBM@Sprint (2008)
desc: For outstanding contributions to service delivery and demonstrating subject matter

data.name: Anbodu Kochi
desc: Anbodu Kochi - came into being, while offering a helping hand for our friends in Chennai during the severe floods of Dec 2015.
It also actively helped during the floods of 2018 in Kochi.
